result.title: First topic
result.content:
Fight for the Red and World Final,never give up!

I'm working on it just for 3 months totally,just an ongoing rookie who has a history of being an mathematical Olympiad participant but unfortunately failed the second-round test. After entering the university,i rejoiced in thinking and solving problems in programming, therefore, Voyage began. Codeforces recommended by friends, from my perspective, is a good platform for beginner even master.I'll spend more time on it,though there is always dreary homework have to do.TT I 'll appreciate it if users in community can give me a hand in aspects of programming, mathematics and even advice on human life or philosophy:>, that 's very kind of you!

Sorry for my poor English!

Picture used in avatar from Pixiv ID: pony
Thanks!
